Author: happyishpenguin
Text: I’m the same way. Logically, I want my period back bc I know it’s super unhealthy that it’s gone. However, I’m constantly terrified of getting it because I feel like it’ll mean I’m not making “progress” or that I’m going backwards. It’s my biggest fear after every binge, as if one day of overeating will undo an amenorrhea, lol

Author: RetailSlaveNo1
Text: Even when I was UW I had mine and I hate it. I spot constantly and it is just proof that I’ll always be fat even when I was 98lb (same height as you). I know I wasn’t super UW but still. Why won’t it go away
